ygData.subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Paladin outrage!! *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: It has already been confirmed that combining the two books from vox and nagafen produces a book of scale, that when given to the oracle in OOT you get an item
ygData.messageBody:
It has already been confirmed that combining the two books from vox and nagafen produces a book of scale, that when given to the oracle in OOT you get an item called miraguls something.. An ARTIFACT item with unknown properties(nobody has gotten any further than this).. And I believe it is highly likely that the artifact is used to resurrect Miragul, however the connection to the FA quest might not be for sure..
 
- Avron -
 
----- Original Message -----
From: CybrWzrd
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, March 10, 2000 2:08 AM
Subject: RE: [eqpaladin] Paladin outrage!! *SPOILER*

From: "CybrWzrd" <cybrwzrd@...>

Well, none of us know that it takes dragon loots. Currently 3/4 of the quest is easy to get, and I am willing to bet that any group going to PoA would welcome another Paladin to come along if he/she was going for Inte Akera in PoA. As it stants Miragul's Head is recieved from killing him in Everfrost. Soulfire is the Nobility part, and GhoulBane is the Sacrafice part. That leaves the robe. and WHY would a ressurected miragul have his robe on him? The robe is probably achieved through a quest.
This is kinda a dead mailing list as Paladins of Norrath exists. http://www2.hpcdsb.edu.on.ca/~jeff_cameron/ is the URL. See you all in EQ and good luck
 
Laurana Highwind
Paladin of Tunare
45th rank
Rathe
-----Original Message-----
 From: Avron [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 09, 2000 10:57 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Paladin outrage!!

From: "Avron" <avron@...>

After reading the quest for the Fiery Avenger I am outraged... YET AGAIN Verant promotes powergaming and uber guilds by making this quest in that spirit.. I am not giving away any spoilers here but you'll find out for yourself.. I'll just say that we have to give up BOTH soulfire and ghoulbane as part of this quest, and this is the EASY part..
 
- Avron K'Nighit -
